hadiths.text: It was narrated fom 'Ata from Ibn 'Umair, from Aishah, that:The Prophet (ﷺ) prayed, bowing six times and prostrating four times. "I said to Mu'adh: 'Is this from the Prophet (ﷺ)?' He said: 'Without a doubt

chapter.ara-name: باب نَوْعٌ آخَرُ مِنْ صَلاَةِ الْكُسُوفِ
chapter.eng-name: Another version of the eclipse prayer
